‚ú¶ Problem:

Users who sell digital products on Paddle often struggle to accurately calculate fees and final profit when using Paddle, making it difficult to assess real earnings and financial planning.

‚ú¶ Solution:

The Paddle fees calculator allows any user to quickly determine the costs they will incur and the profits they will make by selling their digital products on Paddle. This fee calculator simplifies financial management and provides a clear breakdown of fees and expected revenue.

‚ú¶ Features:

‚ú¶ Open in a popup.
‚ú¶ Fees are calculated instantly.
‚ú¶ Easy to use in just a few steps.
‚ú¶ Fast loading in Google Chrome.
‚ú¶ Dark design available.
‚ú¶ Not require special permissions.

‚ú¶ FAQs:

‚ú¶ What is Paddle?
It is a complete billing solution for digital products.

‚ú¶ Why use Paddle?
Paddle is a merchant of record that acts to provide a payment infrastructure to thousands of software companies around the world. One of the main advantages of selling through Paddle is that it takes all the burden of managing VAT and sales tax off your shoulders. It also deals with fraud, billing support and much more.

‚ú¶ Who needs this extension?
Users who sell digital products on Paddle.

‚ú¶ What is the paddle fee?
5% + 50¬¢ per checkout transaction.

‚ú¶ Does this extension work on any page?
Yes. You can open this extension on any page or site.

‚ú¶ What browsers does it work on?
For now it is only available for Google Chrome browser, but soon I will launch in other browsers.

‚ú¶ This extension is free?
Yes. It's FREE and will be forever.
